summary: The video features a voice-over announcing a new effect for Palestine. It explains that users can post one video per day using this filter, which will count towards a tally. The speaker mentions that posting once each weekday (Monday through Wednesday) will accumulate to three counts, whether the posts are made privately or publicly. There are no visible visuals, background music, or other elements provided in the description.
keywords: Palestine, new effect, video filter, daily posts, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, private, public, count, quotes
